rdf:Description.dc:title: English 10 1997
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Education Advantage (Firm)
Alberta. Student Evaluation Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Compiled by Alberta Education, Student Evaluation Branch.
The student materials contains: Collaboration and oral assessment, Reading assessment, Writing assessment as well as Teacher manual and Examples of students' reponses.
Accompanied by: Teacher manual [tch.man.], Examples of students' responses [std.resp.], Student materials for oral assessment video [video].
Video contains: English 10, The tender tale of Cinderella Penguin (9:52). English 13, George and Rosemary (8:48). English 20, Toys (7:46). English 23, Balablok (7:27).
Approved for use in Alberta schools, 1997.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: English language
Language arts (Secondary)
Academic achievement
Education, Secondary
